title: championship zed
body:
Hey guys i wanted to buy championship zed but i coudnt buy it. i looked on the internet and saw alot people saying that it can be only get purchased by special events. Does someone know if that is coming soon or i have to wait alot. so i will buy another skin for now and later just get zed. but i can wait if its coming soon. so someone know if a special event when i can buy the skin is coming soon?

Thanks for reading hope i get answersX

replies.body: Championship skins are only available temporarily.  Per the[ legacy skins ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins)guide, you're more likely to see them during World Finals.  You probably won't see Championship Zed in the store right now, but bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for any news on that.  Let me know if that clears things up!
